instructions: In Notes on iCloud.com, select a folder you want the note to be in. If you do not see the folder list, see Show the folder or notes list in Notes on iCloud.com . Tap the Create Note button . Type your note. Your changes are saved automatically and your new note appears in the notes list, identified by the first few words of the note. You can change the formatting of lines or words in a note. Select the text you want to format, tap the Choose Style button in the toolbar, then choose the format you want to apply.
